column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Babareeba is probably one of the most talked up taparias in the chicago area. The food here is really good
column2: but like any other tapas joint you'll want to get about 2-3 plates a person. I recommend the escargot
column4: and the scallops with couscous. The only issue I had was the wait which was a bit longer than I had anticipated. Everything else on the menu is pretty standard
column5: you cannot go wrong with the queso de cabra and the tortilla espanola. The desserts however were sub par in my opinion. I've a lot of flan before and theirs wasn't as great as I had expected it to be. The chocolate cake wasn't a favorite either. All in all
column6: I would do ba-ba again. It's definitely a safe one.
